1690760.name: Pumpkin Story
1690760.description:
Within the country of Sunderlin there are dark secrets hidden within, waiting to be explored.
the game is about a little pumpkin girl named nikki and
her best pal Asuka who will guide you
through a game of wonder and excitement
it is a collection based exploration game were you gather and illuminate the darkness, use tools and trinkets; like bombs lamps and fire flies to lighten up the dark and save Sunderlin from plunging into darkness!
